thread.title: Demi Lovato Comes to Her Man's Rescue in 'From Dusk Till Dawn' Clip
thread.title_full: Demi Lovato Comes to Her Man's Rescue in 'From Dusk Till Dawn' Clip

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Demi Lovato Comes to Her Man's Rescue in 'From Dusk Till Dawn' Clip
text:
Comments The 'Confident' songstress is a badass in her first look on the thriller series which stars her boyfriend Wilmer Valderrama. 
Demi Lovato will play "the sexy sidekick" to Carlos Madrigal, who is played by her real-life boyfriend Wilmer Valderrama , on " From Dusk Till Dawn ". Now, first look at the singer/actress on the supernatural crime thrilker has made its way out via Entertainment Weekly . In a sneak-peek video, Lovato's Maia shows up in a leather outfit holding a gun to a guy's head when her friends are in a difficult situation. "Who the f**k are you? Nobody messes with my man," she says after tearing off her mask. Lovato will appear in the final two episodes of season 2. Titled "There Will Be Blood" and "Santa Sangre", the last two episodes of the season will air October 20 and October 27 respectively at 9 P.M. ET on El Rey Network. Gary Busey was recently announced to appear in "There Will Be Blood" as a miner who is only known as The Prospector.
